column1: H65,H65_Monica/QC/all.filtered.vcf,BGI_LN-[0-9]+,BGI_LC-[0-9]+ is cancer; *-T1 are multicell samples and need to be removed
W32,W32_Monica/QC/all.filtered.vcf,TNBC_n[0-9]+,a[0-9]+ and h[0-9]+ are cancer cells; a is aneuploid; h is hypoploid
S21_P2,S21_P2/Calls/Filter/Final/QC/all.all_chr.filtered.vcf,P2_\w0,P2_[L|R] are cancer from left|right side of prostate
